mainContent.headerText: Where are you importing plant or plant product into?

supportUrl.text: if you have any queries or you need technical support, email

serviceUnavailablePage.headerText: This service does not contain import and plant health information for Northern Ireland
serviceUnavailablePage.desc1: You will be able to use the service later.
serviceUnavailablePage.desc2: There are different plant health controls for Northern Ireland and Great Britain. You can
serviceUnavailablePage.urlText: view import requirements for plants and plant produce for Northern Ireland
